EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners (1352934125.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Lachantal, It was so nice speaking with you quickly this evening. As I said, my Sara Conde and I’ll be responsible for answering any questions you may have and providing you an overview of our services. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you to chat using my online schedule. <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> You may also watch a short video about who we are on YouTube <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1>. You may also look at some of the stories from independents <http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html> who use MBO Partners. I look forward to speaking with you, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
